property.name: objectLabel
property.value: Seat Pool Definition

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Information about a single seat pool that can be associated with either a course offering or registration group. Seat pools provides a handle for statements that will be used to created enrollment restrictions based on capacity. Seat pools are ordered using rank to enable the most restrictive pools to be filled first.

property.name: summary
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: description
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Expiration Milestone Type Key

property.name: summary
property.value: When this seat pool definition expires.

property.name: label
property.value: Expiration Milestone Type Key

property.name: description
property.value: When this seat pool definition expires. A seat pool whose state is active is active once the registration period for the related ActivityOffering begins. The restriction may expire before the end of the registration period on a Milestone. The Milestone is determined by the Expiration Milestone Type Key on the ATP for the registration period.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Is Percentage

property.name: summary
property.value: Tests if the seat limit is an absolute number or a percentage of MaximumEnrollment in the ActivityOffering.

property.name: label
property.value: Is Percentage

property.name: description
property.value: Tests if the seat limit is an absolute number or a percentage of MaximumEnrollment in the ActivityOffering.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Seat Limit

property.name: summary
property.value: The limit on the number of seats in this pool.

property.name: label
property.value: Seat Limit

property.name: description
property.value: The limit on the number of seats in this pool. The number may be expressed as an absolute number or as an integer representing a percentage (0-100) based on the IsPercentage flag.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Processing Priority

property.name: summary
property.value: Indicates the order in which this seat pool will be processed during registration.

property.name: label
property.value: Processing Priority

property.name: description
property.value: Indicates the order in which this seat pool will be processed during registration. During registration students should be assigned to a seat pool with the lowest possible rank to which he or she meets the restriction requirements.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Population Id

property.name: summary
property.value: The Population to which this seat pool applies.

property.name: label
property.value: Population Id

property.name: description
property.value: The Population to which this seat pool applies.

property.name: summary
property.value: Create and last update info for the structure.

property.name: description
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.
